summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in block 59, A. A. Denny's Addition to the City of Seattle, being the alley from Pike Street to Pine Street, between 6th Avenue and 7th Avenue, by grading the same, and by constructing such bulkheads and sewers with such necessary appurtenances, all in accordance with Resolution No. 1207 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
